category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_stop_import_if_bad_status
preference.preference_description: Set the Stop Import if Bad Status variable to YES to stop the Import process when the status is false in the Import Spreadsheet. If one status in the spreadsheet is set to false, then: - NO = do nothing - MSG = prompt user to continue - YES = stop the Import process
